inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [152067]; see Signed
life_date: Auguste Louis Lepère, French, Paris 1849–Domme, Dordogne 1918
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1990; sold in November for ROOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [A LEPÈRE]; on back, in pencil: [Paris, vu des guinguettes, sous le Sacré-Coeur - L'artist à droite]
title: View of Parisian Taverns, below Sacre-Coeur
